name: SC_VideoCompressBot
description: Telegram's Powerful and simple Video Compress Bot

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable VARs when in ENV mode

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @usetgxbot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @usetgxbot

AUTH_USERS.description: allow only pre-defined users to use this bot
